Description: Papyrus. Demotic legal text: a 'double document'. The 'scriptura interior' is still folded and sealed. Of the 'scriptura exterior' there are five full and two damaged lines. The papyrus is torn at the bottom and an unquantifiable number of lines are lost.
Curator's comments: This is a 'double document', with the 'scriptura interior' still folded and sealed. The first line of the 'scriptura exterior' begins with a date of regnal-year 20 and at the end of the line is written 'receipt'. The second line is damaged and may contain the name and patronym of the person to whom the receipt was given. In the third line it is stated that it is for one deben of silver.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380873) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380873)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus Black ink Clay Tabbed: kraft paper Transferred to horizontal storage 31 JAN 95 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: kraft paper Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: poor
